text: Do you think that Louis C.K isn't a great comedian?

comments.text: I really think he's the most overrated comic in showbusiness at the moment. Can't think of a single live show of his that has made me laugh

replies.text: You, sir, have absolutely no taste in comedy
Obvioulsy man, fucking Chris Rock is 1000 times better and funnier

Bitch, please. Louis is a comic genius. He's so honest and yet so brutal, and the fact that he can balance these two aspects of his comedy without one being overpowering is testament to his comedic talents

comments.text: Louie is the evidence. He's obviously an extremely talented and capable comedian, but his abilities as an artist are what makes him stand out in my opinion. There are scenes in his television shows that are amongst the most poignant moments ever witnessed on screen, and the fact that he looks at issues in such an enlightening, comical way... outstanding comic.

facts.text: 100% of respondents are from Lawrence Ajadi's imagination
